text: ivvāṟu, avaṉ avviruvaraiyum ēmāṟṟi, avarkaḷ (taṅkaḷ nilaiyiliruntu) kīḻē iṟaṅkumpaṭic ceytāṉ - avarkaḷiruvarum am'marattiṉai (am'marattiṉ kaṉiyai)c cuvaittapōtu - avarkaḷuṭaiya veṭkattalaṅkaḷ avarkaḷukku veḷiyāyiṟṟu avarkaḷ cuvaṉapatiyiṉ ilaikaḷāl taṅkaḷai mūṭikkoḷḷa muyaṉṟaṉar; (appōtu) avarkaḷai avarkaḷ iṟaivaṉ kūppiṭṭu; "uṅkaḷiruvaraiyum am'marattai viṭṭum nāṉ taṭukkavillaiyā? Niccayamāka ṣaittāṉ uṅkaḷukku pakiraṅkamāṉa pakaivaṉ eṉṟu nāṉ uṅkaḷukku collavillaiyā?" Eṉṟu kēṭṭāṉ
